name: Kanji Tiles
description:
KANJI TILES

The UI and menus are in Japanese mostly for aesthetic. There's not much to the game, so even people who don't know Japanese should be able to figure out most of the UI intuitively.

The game will keep track of your best times for each board size, so you can always come back and try to beat your best times.

If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to leave a comment!

Design and Programming: Ian Connors
